titleStmt.title: A rejoynder to the reply published by the Iesuites vnder the name of William Malone. The first part. Wherein the generall answer to the challenge is cleared from all the Iesuites cavills
titleStmt.author: Synge, George, 1594-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Societie of Stationers, printers to the Kings most excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Malone, William. A reply to Mr. James Ussher his answere.
In at least some copies this is bound with the preliminaries of STC 20520 and vice versa.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
